"Partner Evaluation":
"Partner Evaluation


If you clear a quest
with a partner character,
Or if you complete
one of their client orders,
That \"Partner Evaluation\" of you will go up.

A Partner's \"Partner Evaluation\" can be found in the campship
from the \"Partner Terminal\"
from the \"Partner List\"
\"

"As your partner's \"Partner Evaluation\" goes up
the \"Present Gague\" will also go up.

When that \"Present Gague\" maxes out
That character's will give you
their present.

A \"present icon\" will show above the partner's head.

A \"present icon\" is shown beside \"Talk\".
Press \"Talk\"
to get the present.\"
